Class Losses

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Losses
@StaticUtility public final class Losses extends Object
Provides commonly used ObjectiveFunction implementations as reusable, static singletons.

The Losses class serves as a convenience utility for retrieving standard objective functions such as Mean Squared Error (MSE) and Binary Cross-Entropy (BCE). These functions are frequently used in optimization and machine learning tasks, making them natural defaults for training pipelines.
